name: Counter Spell
descricao:
You attempt to interrupt a creature you can see within 60 feet in the process of casting a spell. If the creature is casting a spell of that uses half of the mana used by this spell, its spell fails and has no effect. Otherwise, if it is casting a spell using less than the mana used by you, make an ability check using your spellcasting ability. The DC equals 10 + the spell's level. On a success, the creature's spell fails and has no effect.
	**Enhance Spell.** You can cast this spell with a huge amount of mana. Choose an arbitrary number (e.g. 20000) and roll a d20, multiply the die value by the number you chose, that's the total mana you'll spend.
